synopsis.text: My master's final request sends me from the tranquility of the mountains into the bustling secular world, where I am to become a humble son-in-law in my wife's family. The world underestimates me, labeling me as an inept individual, but little do they know, I am an unrivaled swordsman, a sword fairy looking down upon the world with unparalleled skill. Ignoring the skeptical glances and whispered ridicule, I am ready to unveil my true self and let my sword conquer the universe, shattering the very skies above.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
